t: Amazon Launches New Size Chart Self-Serve Tool for Brand Registry Members | Swipe Insight
s: May 23, 2024 - The Amazon Size Chart Self-Serve Tool is a new feature available to brands registered under Amazon's Brand Registry. It allows users to effortlessly add, modify, and manage size charts for their products independently, without needing assistance from Selling Partner Support.
